sentences.english: Color symbol, the blue symbolizes joy and win loyal to our motherland.
sentences.chinese: 色象徵歡樂和勝利，藍色象徵忠於祖國。

sentences.english: These bluegrass pickers say they try to stay faithful to Monroe's style.
sentences.chinese: 這些採摘早熟禾說，他們試圖保持忠於夢露的風格。

sentences.english: We should, one and all, be loyal to the Party and people.
sentences.chinese: 我們每個人應該忠於黨和人民。

sentences.english: During the English Civil War the Channel Isle of Jersey remained loyal to the Crown and gave sanctuary to the King.
sentences.chinese: 在英國內戰海峽澤西島仍忠於官方和庇護了國王。

sentences.english: and I had question along who is that who is that the Army is going to be loyal to in the end.
sentences.chinese: 我還是不知道最終軍隊要忠於誰。

sentences.english: Osama asked. “Duty to God and to your country, and to help others.”
sentences.chinese: 奧薩馬問，“忠於上帝和祖國，以善待人。”

sentences.english: The soldiers are loyal to their country.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們忠於他們的國家。

sentences.english: My followers, unlike yours, are loyal to their oaths.
sentences.chinese: 我的追隨者，不像你的那樣，忠於他們的誓言。

sentences.english: When I joined Ferrari the whole team was so devoted to Gilles.
sentences.chinese: 我加入法拉利時整支車隊都是如此忠於吉爾。

sentences.english: Nemesis, the goddess of measure and not of revenge, keeps watch.
sentences.chinese: 正義而非復仇女神尼彌米西斯，向來忠於職守。

sentences.english: Then they will always be loyal to him.
sentences.chinese: 然後他們就總會死心塌地的效忠於他了。

sentences.english: Arians are loyal to family and friends.
sentences.chinese: 白羊座忠於家庭和朋友。

sentences.english: Hot loyal to public welfare, has repeatedly Voluntary Blood Donation.
sentences.chinese: 熱忠於公益事業，曾屢次義務獻血。

sentences.english: Further to the west, Bin Jawad has fallen to forces loyal to the Libyan leader.
sentences.chinese: 繼西彬賈瓦德已經下降到部隊忠於利比亞領導人。

sentences.english: This remastered version is faithful to the original, including its unforgiving difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 此修復版的版本忠於原著，包括那些無情的關卡。

sentences.english: The sincerity of his beliefs is unquestionable.
sentences.chinese: 他忠於信念，這是毋庸置疑的。

definition: to be willing to/to be ready to/to be content with/accepting (of restriction, sacrifice, risk etc)
to bend to a task and spare no effort (idiom); striving to the utmost
to see, hear and obey (idiom); to take advice/to take sb at his word
to surrender and pay allegiance to
